owner-operator.title: Consortium Only Membership
owner-operator.subTitle: Includes DOT-Required Consortium
features: DOT Requirement: Random consortium enrollment (includes enrollment certificate & random selections)
Access to cloud-based software to order drug testing & view results electronically 24/7
Laboratory and Medical Review Officer (MRO) Services
Annual Statistical Tracking & Reporting and Complete Audit Support

owner-operator.title: DOT: Complete Compliance Membership
owner-operator.subTitle: Includes DOT-Required Consortium + Clearinghouse Management
features: DOT Requirement: Random consortium enrollment (includes enrollment certificate & random selections)
Access to cloud-based software to order drug testing & view results electronically 24/7
Laboratory and Medical Review Officer (MRO) Services
Annual Statistical Tracking & Reporting and Complete Audit Support
Clearinghouse Reporting (including running all required Queries, reporting Return-to-Duty & Follow-Up test results, and reporting violations)
